alert.note: Alert for Cass; Jackson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 02 at 9:36PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR CASS...NORTHERN BATES AND SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 936 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Prairie Village to 8 miles west of Butler, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lee`s Summit, Grandview, Belton, Raymore, Harrisonville, Pleasant Hill, Greenwood, Peculiar, Adrian, Garden City, Archie, Lake Winnebago, Freeman, East Lynne, Lake Annette, Baldwin Park, Strasburg, Gunn City, Unity Village and Passaic. This includes Interstate 470 between mile markers 1 and 12. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
